pageContext.title: Minimal Theme Slider (PRO)
pageContext.miniDescription: Custom slideshow for the Shopify's Minimal theme product page. Swipe, arrows, thumbnails and much more.
pageContext.description:
Premium quality, hand coded slider for the Shopify's official Minimal theme. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this slider working live clicking here.


→ Live Demo ←



What you'll get:


This plugin creates extra options at the customize page of your theme.


Below, whichever options have (customizable) are options that you'll be to enable, disable and/or customize in some way.


Here are all the main features:


- Swipe featured image

- Featured image arrows (customizable - enable for desktop only, mobile only or both)

- Featured image loop (customizable)

- Sliding smooth animation (customizable - you can enable or disable it)

- Zoom on mouse hover️ (customizable)

- Zoom on mouse click - shows image on a lightbox/popup (customizable, works only for desktop)

- Swipe thumbnails

- Thumbnail arrows (customizable - enable for desktop only, mobile only or both)

- Thumbnail images loop (customizable)

- Amount of visibile thumbnails: 3, 4, 5, 6 or use the default Minimal thumbnails without slider.

You can choose a different number for desktop & mobile devices, for example, show 6 thumbnails on desktop and 3 on mobile.

- Highlighted thumbnail alignment (left, center or right)

- Thumbnail vertical alignment (top or center)

- Adaptive height - slider automatically adapts to images with different heights.

- Update featured image to its equivalent variant whenever changing a variant through the dropdown (works exclusively with dropdowns. If you're using custom swatches or buttons to show variants this function will not work.)

- Update dropdown whenever changing an image to its equivalent variant (works exclusively with dropdowns. If you're using custom swatches or buttons to show variants this function will not work.)

- Update the featured image if a variant is on the URL

- Lazyload to improve performance (customizable)

- Life time free updates

- Life time free bug fixes

- Constantly maintained and improved


...and much more!


Installation:


Installation takes less than 1 minute.


You just need to copy and paste the files that come in this product in your theme.


Detailed instructions can be found here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Important Notes:


✓ This code works exclusively on the Minimal Theme


✓ If you have custom code in the product page (inside the file product-template.liquid), this code may overwrite them. If you'd like to install the slider and keep your product page customizations (in case there are any), we offer custom integration for an additional fee of $30 USD.


✓ The thumbnails work only below the main image, not on the right side.


﻿Unsure whether it would work on your theme? Send us an email and we'll be more than happy to help you figure it out.


﻿ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see in the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds.


If you have any unanswered questions please feel free to reach out to us before making your purchase, we'll be happy to help.


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Responsive Banner Section (PRO)
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Banner Section that allows you to use an image for mobile devices and, optionally, a different one on desktop.
relatedProducts.description:
This is a responsive banner section for Shopify coded by a certified Shopify partner.



What you'll get:



It works out of the box with any theme with sections. It allows you to:


✔️ Lazyload to improve performance

✔️ Images are preloaded to avoid CLS issues on your Google score

✔️ Add a link to redirect on click

✔️ Open link on new tab or same page

✔️ Use an image for desktop and a different one for mobile devices

✔️ Controllable top margin/spacing

✔️ Controllable top margin/spacing

✔️ Works on every single theme

✔️ Lifetime free updates


Installation:


Installation takes 30 seconds. You can find detailed instructions clicking here.


You just need to copy/paste the file that comes in this download.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Thank you!

relatedProducts.title: Minimal Theme - Second Image on Hover
relatedProducts.miniDescription: Code snippet for the Minimal theme that displays a second product image when hovered. Animations can be enabled/disabled.
relatedProducts.description:
Show a second image when hovering over your collection items.


Super simple code snippet to quickly copy and paste into your Minimal theme. No time waste, no headaches, same day response support for any help you need. Coded by a certified Shopify partner.


One image is worth a thousand words, but one live preview's worthiness is beyond evaluation! So check this code snippet working live here:


→ Live Demo ←



What you'll get:





This code snippet creates extra options at the customize page of your theme.


Below, whichever options have (customizable) are options that you'll be to enable, disable and/or customize in some way.


Here are all the current features:


- Show the product's second or last image on hover (customizable)

- Subtle animation on hover (customizable - you can turn it on/off and also customize the delay of the transition)

- Automatically fixes aspect ratio for images with different sizes

- Align images to top or middle, like in the original Minimal's theme

- Works with the "you may also like" section

- Life time free updates

- Constantly maintained and improved


Installation:


Installation takes less than 1 minute!


You just need to copy and paste the files that come in this product in your theme.


Detailed instructions can be found here.


Support:


We give 100% support to all of its users to ensure that what you're seeing on the demo page is exactly what you see on your website, same day responses are guaranteed.


If you have any questions, troubles or find bugs just reach out to me:


ezfycode@gmail.com


Important Notes:


✔️ This code works exclusively on the Minimal theme


﻿Unsure whether it would work on your theme? Send us an email and we'll be more than happy to help you figure it out.


﻿ezfycode@gmail.com


FAQ:


Q: My collection items are already customized. Can I integrate this code snippet into it since I can't delete everything in the product-card-grid?

A: Absolutely. We offer custom integration for $30 USD.


Q: What is included in the support?

A: We ensure that whatever you see in the demo page is what appears on your own website. In addition, any bugs you find will be promptly investigated and fixed.


Q: Do you offer refunds?

A: Taking into consideration that it's a digital product with a live demo we do not offer refunds.


If you have any unanswered questions please feel free to reach out to us before making your purchase, we'll be happy to help.


Thank you!
